Package org.dellroad.stuff.vaadin23.util

Class SelfRenderer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vaadin.flow.data.renderer.Renderer<SOURCE>
      • com.vaadin.flow.data.renderer.ComponentRenderer<Component,​T>
        • org.dellroad.stuff.vaadin23.util.SelfRenderer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the input model object
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    public class SelfRenderer<T>
extends ComponentRenderer<Component,​T>
    A "do nothing" ComponentRenderer used to render property values that are already Component's.

    This becomes the default renderer() for @GridColumn annotations on methods that return sub-types of Component: 

    
 public class User {

     // Render username normally - no special Renderer is used
     @GridColumn(header = "Username", width = "50px")
     public String getUsername() { ... }

     // Render foobar with a custom renderer
     @GridColumn(header = "Foobar", width = "64px", renderer = FoobarRenderer.class)
     public Foobar getFoobar() { ... }

     // Render status with an Image - as if we had said "renderer = SelfRenderer.class"
     @GridColumn(header = "Status", width = "64px")
     public Image getStatus() { ... }
 }

    This class adds graceful handling of null values; null values are converted into empty Text components.

    See Also:
    GridColumn, GridColumnScanner, Serialized Form
